author: Brenton Taylor

text:
Ah, Sootopolis... the only city in pokemon where you could legit break the game without meaning to, while entirely playing by the rules. Release or trade away all your surf able pokemon, while owning exactly zero fishing rods, and you will never leave that little island the pokecenter is on... unless you can get a friend to trade a surfer to you!

Very relaxing tune to be marooned on an island forever to tho, u gotta admit.
